jena_4598bf0.message:
Workaround for IBM JDK issue with subtracting durations causing an NPE.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jena/trunk@1397034 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

jena_643bd7a.message:
Fix and tests for possible NPE (JENA-1405)

Fixes a possible NPE in AdaptorFileManager by aligning its behaviour
with FileManager to throw NotFoundException

Adds specific tests for these cases

jena_7a49993.message:
JENA-406 NullPointerException using xsd:anySimpleType

Fixes:
1/ core - check before starting the two slot sliding window walking the type tree in XSDDatatype.getFoundingType().
2/ TDB protects itself against throwables when attempting to inline nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jena/trunk@1450979 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

jena_7ebf5a6.message:
Fix possible NPE in Elephas Turtle IO (JENA-1075)

Fixes a reported NPE in Elephas Turtle IO.  Includes a range of new
tests that exercise the generic input formats over the various supported
formats though testing and analysis implies that this bug only affects
Turtle
